name: copyright-manager
description: Adds copyright headers and audit the stage files

yourExtension.developerName.description: Default developer name to use in copyright headers

yourExtension.organizationName.description: Organization or company name used in copyright headers

yourExtension.copyrightTemplate.description: Template for the copyright text. Use placeholders: {fileName}, {purpose}, {developerName}, {creationDate}

yourExtension.enableAuditHistory.description: Enable adding audit (maintenance history) entries to existing files

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
